summary: A man wandering in a volcanic desert forms a band of murderous cannibals. A post-war German industrialist learns that his son is unable to make decisions or form relationships.
cast: Pierre Clémenti|Jean-Pierre Léaud|Alberto Lionello|Ugo Tognazzi|Anne Wiazemsky|Margarita Lozano|Marco Ferreri|Franco Citti|Ninetto Davoli|Luigi Barbini|Sergio Elia|Antonino Faà di Bruno
title: Pocilga
